name: Panasonic 650 Watt EH-KA11 Hair Styler, White
description: Love styling your hair but can't find the right product to get the job done? The Panasonic EH KA11 Hair Styler Get lets you achieve amazing hairdos right from the comfort of your home. The 360 degree swivel cord of the appliance won't get tangled while it is not in use. The long cord of the styler makes sure that you can effortlessly use the device even if it is plugged in at a distance from the mirror. This hair styler machine is equipped with a blow air attachment that can be used to achieve a broad range of hairstyles without damaging your tresses. Available in a white finish, the Panasonic EH KA11 Hair Styler features three heat settings that let you adjust the temperature of the device according to your styling needs and hair type. HIGH ON STYLE Every Panasonic hair styler review applauds its sleek design and compact dimensions that allow a firm grip and enable you to use the device with absolute ease. The ergonomic design also ensures that you can carry this product everywhere you go without adding too much bulk to your person. EASY TO USE The Panasonic EH KA11 Hair Styler features a 1.8m cord that swivels 360 degree. The long cord ensures you can effortlessly use the device, even if it is plugged in at a distance from the mirror. The device has three heat settings that let you adjust the temperature of the styler according to your styling needs and hair type. This Panasonic hair straightener consumes 650W of power, and thus is very energy efficient.
short_description:
Every Panasonic hair styler review applauds its sleek design and compact dimensions that allow a firm grip and enable you to use the device with absolute ease.
The ergonomic design also ensures that you can carry this product everywhere you go without adding too much bulk to your person.
The Panasonic EH KA11 Hair Styler features a 1.8m cord that swivels 360 degree

name: Panasonic Multigroom Beard Trimmer Kit For Face, Head, Body Hair Styling and Grooming, 39 Quick-Adjust Dial Trim Settings, Cordless/Cord, – ER-GB80-S, Silver
description:
2015 men’s health grooming award
Multi-groom beard trimmer: The all in 1 trimmer uses durable, super sharp 45 degree angle stainless steel, hypoallergenic blades to cut quickly and cleanly for efficient beard, head, body, and face hair grooming
Adjustable beard trimmer dial: The quick adjust trimmer dial and three comb attachments provide 39 precision settings for personalized sculpting, trimming, cutting and detailing
Slide up trimmer: Slide up 45 degree trimmer built into the men’s electric razor adds the perfect trimming and detail to beards, mustaches and sideburns
Ergonomic, rubberized grip: The ergonomic beard and hair trimmer design with rubberized grip provides for total comfort and control; Clean the trimmer in seconds under warm running water
Cordless/corded operation: Use the trimmer cordless anytime, anywhere for up to 50 minutes with rechargeable battery power or plug in for longer use; Includes three comb attachments, a cleaning brush, ac adapter/charger and universal voltage for international travel (AC 100 240V) charging time 1 hour
Max power consumption: 2 watts

This mains or battery operated trimmer gives you 12 cutting length options, with sharp blades for greater precision. The comfortable grip of the trimmer enables easy maneuvering and you can style your hair in combination with a comb or fingers. The Panasonic trimmer gives you a precise cutting experience for a perfect and well-groomed look. Product Features: Men's Trimmer. Easy adjustments with quick adjust dial (2-18/12 steps). name: Panasonic ER217 Hair and Beard Trimmer Wet & Dry
description:
The Panasonic ER217 is a men's trimmer made for an efficient trimming experience. You can create your own style of beard with the help of the Panasonic ER217 trimmer. Maintain stubble or a thick beard using this men's trimmer according to your requirements. The Panasonic ER217 men's trimmer can be used both in and out of the shower.

Featured with a floating cutter type trimming head, the Panasonic men's trimmer adjusts to all the contours of your face and neck. When used on electricity, this Panasonic ER217 trimmer gives an effective corded trim and when powered by rechargeable battery the men's trimmer gives a proficient cordless trim. The range of electricity required for the Panasonic men's trimmer to function smoothly is 100 ~ 240 V. Be it sporting a stylish five o'clock shadow or a solemn thick beard, the Panasonic ER217 trimmer is an ideal choice.

 Features :

HIGH-PERFORMANCE BLADE
SPRING-LOADED HIGH-PERFORMANCE STAINLESS STEEL BLADES REQUIRE NO USER 

ADJUSTMENT.
QUICK ADJUST DIAL WITH 14 SETTINGS

SHAPES YOUR BEARD BEAUTIFULLY WHETHER YOU PREFER IT SHORT, MEDIUM-LENGTH, OR LONG.

WASHABLE CORD/ CORDLESS OPERATION
ULTIMATE ONE - PASS SHAVING COMFORT SMOOTHLY SHAVES EVERY CONTOUR
DETAIL TRIMMER

LENGTH SETTINGS
14 CUTTING LENGTH ADJUST EMENTS (0.5-20MM)
SPECIAL COMB FOR BEARD TRIMMING     YES
USAGE TIME   50 MIN
CHARGE TIME    8 HR
WET N DRY / WASHABLE    WASHABLE
COUNTRY OF ORIGIN
MADE IN JAPAN
VOLTAGE     220 ~ 240V
CORD/CORDLESS OPERATION     YES

name: Panasonic ER-GN30-K Nose Ear Hair Trimmer
description:
Innovative dual edge blades: Panasonic nose hair trimmer for men comfortably removes nose, ear and unwanted facial hair plus details beards and eyebrows with dual edge blades
Clean and precision trimming: Curved, hypoallergenic, stainless steel blades match the contour of your nostrils to trim the hair safely and precisely, without irritating skin or pulling hairs
Wet/dry convenience: Fully waterproof men’s personal groomer is made for nose and ear trimming convenience, safely use dry anytime or in the shower
Smart vortex cleaning system: Vortex cleaning system draws in faucet water from all sides and spins it through the nose hair clipper for easy cleaning in seconds
Cordless and battery operated: Panasonic trimmer is fully powered by one AA size battery (not included); A protective nose clipper cap and cleaning brush are included

name: Panasonic EH-KA31 Hair Styler with 3 Attachments , White
description:
If you are looking for hair straighteners online, then you have come to the right place. The Panasonic EH KA31 Hair Styler enables you to achieve a salon like looks from the comfort of your home. The device allows you to fashion a broad range of hairstyles with its wide array of attachments. This hair styler machine comes with a blow brush, an air iron, and an adjustable roller brush, which will provide you with the perfect look for any occasion in a matter of minutes. The Panasonic EH KA31 Hair Styler sports an elegant white finish. It has 650W output and produces 59dB of sound while operational. This hair styler, with an anti static panel and gentle drying mode, enables you to try out various hairdos without damaging your hair.

AMAZING CONTROLS
This hair straightener and curler by Panasonic, with three distinct speed and heat settings, gives you optimum control to suit your styling needs and hair type. The styler ensures the safety of its internal components, as well as that of your hair by automatically regulating its temperature level, thus preventing any possible damage due to overheating.

SLIM DESIGN
Every Panasonic EH KA31 Hair Styler review points towards its chic, sleek built and compact dimensions that allow you to hold the device firmly. This hair straightener and curler by Panasonic comes with multiple attachments to give you the hairdo you desire. It includes a blow brush, an air iron, and an adjustable roller brush, which give a beauty parlor like professional touch to your hair.
short_description: If you are looking for hair straighteners online, then you have come to the right place. The Panasonic EH KA31 Hair Styler enables you to achieve a salon like looks from the comfort of your home. The device allows you to fashion a broad range of hairstyles with its wide array of attachments. This hair styler machine comes with a blow brush, an air iron

name: Panasonic ES2265 Body Shaver & Beard Trimmer 2-in-1 Wet & Dry With Charging Stand
description:
The Panasonic ES2265 2 in 1 Body Shaver and Beard Trimmer is designed to get rid of hair on your body and face while in or out of the shower. Its excellent design and innovative features make either job simple. The body of this Panasonic shaver and trimmer has an extendable handle, which lets you reach to difficult body zones like your back. Moreover, its hypoallergenic blades go gentle on the skin and prevents irritation or bruises. Available in a blue and silver color, this 2 in 1 body shaver cum trimmer offers up to 50 minutes of usage time with just 5 hours of charging.

SKIN FRIENDLY
The Panasonic wet dry shaver and trimmer is made up of hypoallergenic, stainless steel blades that is gentle on the skin. It prevents skin irritation, and also protects it from cuts or nicks. This unit can be used wet or dry, and works well in the shower too, giving you the freedom to use it the way you want.

HIGHLY FLEXIBLE
This Panasonic body shaver is made with a three way flexible and extendable handle that reaches even the most challenging zones easily. The handle can extend up to 75mm and bends in 6 places. Additionally, the three combs allow trimming of hair from 2 to 14mm in length.
short_description: The Panasonic ES2265 2 in 1 Body Shaver and Beard Trimmer is designed to get rid of hair on your body and face while in or out of the shower. Its excellent design and innovative features make either job simple. The body of this Panasonic shaver and trimmer has an extendable handle, which lets you reach to difficult body zones like your back

name: Babyliss Multi Styler Curling Iron Hair Curler - BAB-MS21SDE, Silver
description: Babyliss pro styler features six distinct style settings to help you achieve the hairstyle you want. This Babyliss hair styler comes with various accessories.The Babyliss BAB MS21SDE Multi Styler Curling Iron Hair Curler comes with a sophisticated assortment of multiple styling ranges, which allows you to style your hair in multiple ways. Be it straightening the ends or creating pretty curls this hair styler delivers superior end results within moments. It has straightening, curling, crimping, and spiral plates as well as hair pins. The styler comes with over six different style settings to help you achieve a perfect hairstyle. These plates, in scarlet and pink shades, have a variable setting in 32mm and 19mm dimension with three clips for extra hold. Available in a dominant silver finish, Babyliss BAB MS21SDE multi styler curling iron hair styler comes with a storage pouch for easy storage. Ideal Build This Babyliss pro styler comes with a unique to secure the various plates on safely. Sweep across the whole range of temperature settings with a Smart know wheel. The thermoset plastic build of the appliance has been reinforced with ceramic to offer extra protection against heat. This rugged design also makes the styler shock proof and break proof against fall. Versatile Use This Babyliss hair styler lets you play around with an array of styling range by offering up to one hundred and eighty degrees of heating performance. The six different style settings help you achieve perfect hairstyle while the excellently shaped heating plates provide seamless gliding operation from start to finish. The Smart know wheel lets you quickly change the temperature settings without a pause. The styler comes with various accessories such as ceramic straightener, and ceramic hair iron among others.

name: Braun Series 9 9240s Electric Wet & Dry Foil Shaver With Charging Stand
description:
Electric shaver with 5 shaving elements specialised to capture different types of facial hair
SyncroSonic technology automatically adapts to your beard and provides extra power exactly where you need it to remove more hair in one stroke
Shaves in straight lines, offering unmatched skin comfort and reduced risk of skin irritation
In an attractive, highly durable, corrosion-resistant titanium coating that protects the trimmer
Includes a compact charging stand that ensures your shaver is always fully charged and ready to use
Can be used for both dry and wet shaving with water, foam, or gel for even better gliding

Braun Series 9 is the world's most efficient and comfortable shaver (proven on 3-day beards vs. leading premium tier products). With fully flexible head and floating shaving elements, Series 9 9240s delivers a close, smooth shave and an unmatched skin comfort. Patented SyncroSonic technology reads and automatically adapts to your beard, providing extra power where needed. Additionally, the shaver is equipped with a convenient charging stand to ensure that your shaver is always fully charged and ready to use. Braun Series 9 provides a close, comfortable shave without any compromises.
short_description: Braun Series 9 is the world's most efficient and comfortable shaver (proven on 3-day beards vs. leading premium tier products). With fully flexible head and floating shaving elements, Series 9 9240s delivers a close, smooth shave and an unmatched skin comfort. Patented SyncroSonic technology reads and automatically adapts to your beard, providing extra power where needed. Additionally, the shaver is equipped with a convenient charging stand to ensure that your shaver is always fully charged and ready to use. Braun Series 9 provides a close, comfortable shave without any compromises.

name: Braun Series 9 9290cc Electric Wet & Dry Foil Shaver With Clean & Charge Station
description:
Brand : Braun
Series 9 - World’s most efficient shaver
Exceptionally gentle. With SyncroSonic™ technology and a Titanium coated middle trimmer
Five specialized shaving elements capture more hair in one stroke for fewer strokes and less skin irritation
SyncroSonic™ Technology 
Our patented technology reads and automatically adapts to your beard
Precision trimmer
The integrated and skin-friendly precision trimmer slides out of the back of the shaver for easy and more accurate sideburn shaping.
MultiHeadLock
The easily accessible MultiHeadLock locks the fully flexible shaver head in five positions to achieve a more precise shave. This is especially helpful when shaving hard to reach areas, like under the jawline and under the nose.
Grip for secure handling
The rubberized, textured grip zone features Braun‘s signature dot pattern. It ensures safe and confident handling even in wet conditions.
100% waterproof
Experience premium German engineering quality. All Braun shavers are waterproof up to 5 metres , so you can conveniently rinse them under running water or even shave under the shower
Wet&Dry usage
Shave wet or dry
With Series 9 you can shave dry or use water, foam or gel for even better gliding and a smoother skin feeling.
Powerful rechargeable Li-Ion battery
50min cordless shaving
The state-of-the-art Li-Ion battery never loses performance and fully recharges in one hour. The premium LED display counts down the remaining minutes of shave time.
LED display
All information at a single glance: the precise LED display shows battery status, hygiene status and travel lock indicator.
Running/Charging time
Fully charged in 1 hour
Shaves for 50 minutes
State of the art Li-Ion battery delivers power reliably
Quick-charge for one shave in only 5 minutes

name: Braun Silk-épil 9 9-558 Wet & Dry Cordless epilator with 5 extras including a face epilator
description:
The 40% wider epilation head removes more hair in one stroke*, even the shortest that waxing cannot catch (* vs other Braun epilators)
Cordless Wet & Dry use – Virtually painless with regular use
Includes a facial epilator to precisely remove even the finest facial hair from the root for long lasting smooth skin
With 3 extras: a face epilator, a high frequency massage cap and a skin contact cap

Braun introduces Silk-épil 9, the new standard of epilation excellence with a wide epilation head for faster results and breakthrough MicroGrip tweezer technology. With a 40% wider head*, the new Silk-épil 9 covers more area and removes more hair in one stroke for faster epilation. The MicroGrip tweezer technology introduces Braun's most innovative tweezers with an improved geometry to increase the plucking and feeding performance and gently remove more hairs in one stroke. The combination of these two features results in faster hair removal, even on the shortest hairs (0.5mm) that wax cannot catch, for up to 4 weeks of smooth skin. The Wet & Dry cordless usage allows you to use it in the bath or shower for a gentler epilation. When used regularly, epilation is virtually painless. The Bonus Edition features a face epilator that precisely removes finest facial hair from the root for up to 4 weeks of smooth skin and a flawless beauty from head to toe. *vs other Braun epilators

name: Braun Silk epil 3 3170 Legs Epilator with Massage Cap
description:
HOW TO EPILATE: TIPS FOR FIRST-TIME USERS
Evenings are the best time for epilation; you’re more relaxed, and any minor bumps will be gone by the morning! The best preparation is exfoliation in a warm shower. It will leave your skin clean and relaxed and helps to reduce those dreaded in-grown hairs. Use an exfoliation scrub or mitt, or we recommend our Braun Silk-épil SkinSpa innovative exfoliating brush for 4x better results than manual.

When epilating, hold your epilator so that it feels natural. Hold at a 90 degree angle to your legs and run the epilator in an upward motion, against the direction of hair growth. There’s no need to press down too hard, simply touch the epilator lightly on the skin. Braun Silk-épil’s cooling glove and massaging rollers help to minimise discomfort, and with regular use, epilation becomes virtually painless.

The golden rule is to moisturise after epilation, not before. Apply body lotion for the best results and get set for super-soft, silky skin in the morning.
short_description: Evenings are the best time for epilation; you’re more relaxed, and any minor bumps will be gone by the morning! The best preparation is exfoliation in a warm shower. It will leave your skin clean and relaxed and helps to reduce those dreaded in-grown hairs. Use an exfoliation scrub or mitt, or we recommend our Braun Silk-épil SkinSpa innovative exfoliating brush for 4x better results than manual.

name: Philips BG3010 Showerproof Body Groomer + Free Bag
description:
Smooth body shaveDesigned to protect even in sensitive areasSkin friendly shaver1 click-on comb, 3mm50mins cordless use/8h charge
Confidently shave or trim all body zonesDesigned to be safe and comfortable for underarms, chest & abs, shoulders, groin area and legs. The skin friendly shaver catches and cuts hairs of different lengths, without the need for multiple tools or skin contact with sharp edges.
Rounded tips and hypoallergenic foil for skin comfortThe shaver head features patented rounded tips and a hypo-allergenic foil to protect your skin while shaving. The bi-directional trimmers cut longer hairs, which are shaved by the foil for a closer result.
Includes 1 comb for a natural trim (3mm)1 comb included for a natural 3mm trim. Attach the comb onto the shaving system, to trim hair to a fixed length of 3mm. You can use the shaving system without the comb, for a closer result. For thicker hair, pre-trimming with the comb is recommended.
50 minutes cordless use after an 8-hour chargeHigh-power rechargeable battery for full body use, with 50 minutes of cordless use after an 8-hour charge. The battery light indicates power status, when the battery is low or full.
Easy to clean and use in or out of the showerProvides a comfortable and close result in or out of the shower. The body groomer is fully water-resistant, so you can simply rinse it clean when you've finished. For longer hair, trimming performance may be better on dry hair.
Ergonomic grip for maximum controlThe rubber grip is designed to ensure optimal handling even when wet, for better control during use, in or out of the shower.
2 year guarantee, worldwide voltage, no oil neededAll of our grooming products are built to last. They come with a 2 year worldwide guarantee, worldwide voltage compatibility, and they never need to be oiled.

name: Remington S3500 Ceramic Slim Hair Straightener
description:
Remington S3500 Ceramic Slim 230 straightener has antistatic Ceramic coated plates giving your hair more protection.
It’s fast-working, reaching a top heat of 230ºC in a super quick 15 seconds.
4 X Protection for smooth shine & less static
Anti static
Ceramic
Tourmaline
Smooth glide plates
High heat setting 150-230°C
Slim extra long 110 mm plates
Floating plates for superior alignment
Fast 15 seconds heat–up for instant styling
Variable temperature wheel:
With variable heat settings, Remington puts you in control of the temperature so you can find the perfect heat setting for your hair type.

Automatic safety shut off after 60 minutes
Plate lock for storage
Worldwide voltage
Heat resistant pouch
Swivel cord
